--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Colin Green <cgreen@d...> wrote:

> Do you think there is scope for improving upon existing RETE algorithms 
> or is this more of a proof of concept project?

Well, it'll be an "improvement" only in the way that I want to add
evolutionary hooks to the RETE.  I'm not even sure how I'll do that
yet, or if that will require any modifications at all.   As with NEAT
I think the question will be how to construct the genes that describe
a RETE and the algorithm (network) itself will remain unchanged.

GreG
